overview: Collection of six short films from Nova. "Pumping Eight" — These two muscle eaters show what a slant board is really all about. "Lapping It Up" — Towel-flipping horseplay by a couple of speed swimmers leads to a stinging sore cock, but after it's been kissed and made well, additional stroking seems to be in order. "Hard Tackle" — A football player's strained muscle needs careful, loving attention and it certainly does get it. "No Holds Barred" — Wrestling is the kind of body contact sport that arouses tremendous responses - even when you end up on the bottom. "Extra Innings" — Mutual admiration between baseball teammates can't go far enough, but it surely can go all the way. "Hard Kicks" — A leg injury brings two soccer players into the jock aroma of the lockerroom and helping a buddy becomes a two-way sport of hot lips and hips.
title: Jocks
